channel.title: Images on OTC ImageFactory
channel.description: Recent content in Images on OTC ImageFactory

item.description: CentOS Images getImages("CentOS".split(",")); #imagebrowser .ib-content { max-height: 30em; overflow: auto; } #imagebrowser .ib-header, #imagebrowser .ib-folder, #imagebrowser .ib-file { display: flex; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } #imagebrowser .ib-folder:hover, #imagebrowser .ib-file:hover { display: flex; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); } #imagebrowser .ib-folder { cursor: pointer; } #imagebrowser .ib-folder-icon { height: 0.8em; margin-bottom: 0.2em; transition: transform 100ms linear; } #imagebrowser .ib-folder-icon.ib-open { transform: rotate(90deg); } #imagebrowser .

Oracle Linux Images getImages("OEL".split(",")); #imagebrowser .ib-content { max-height: 30em; overflow: auto; } #imagebrowser .ib-header, #imagebrowser .ib-folder, #imagebrowser .ib-file { display: flex; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } #imagebrowser .ib-folder:hover, #imagebrowser .ib-file:hover { display: flex; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); } #imagebrowser .ib-folder { cursor: pointer; } #imagebrowser .ib-folder-icon { height: 0.8em; margin-bottom: 0.2em; transition: transform 100ms linear; } #imagebrowser .ib-folder-icon.ib-open { transform: rotate(90deg); } #imagebrowser .

Red Hat Enterprise Linux Images Available RedHat Images We have dropped minor numbers for all distributions except SLES. This is because installing all maintenance updates for most distributions automatically implies moving to the next minor version – there is no possibility to stay on an old minor version and still have full maintenance, as there are no parallel maintenance streams per major version. (The only exception is SLES, where old service packs are maintained in an own stream in parallel to the latest for a limited amount of time.

SUSE Images getImages("openSUSE".split(",")); #imagebrowser .ib-content { max-height: 30em; overflow: auto; } #imagebrowser .ib-header, #imagebrowser .ib-folder, #imagebrowser .ib-file { display: flex; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } #imagebrowser .ib-folder:hover, #imagebrowser .ib-file:hover { display: flex; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); } #imagebrowser .ib-folder { cursor: pointer; } #imagebrowser .ib-folder-icon { height: 0.8em; margin-bottom: 0.2em; transition: transform 100ms linear; } #imagebrowser .ib-folder-icon.ib-open { transform: rotate(90deg); } #imagebrowser .

Windows Images Windows Server Image Content The Windows Server Images for OTC are build based on the Microsoft Standard ISO images It is a default OS installation with: System disk of min 40 GB Drivers for XEN, KVM, GPU (NVIDIA), BMS (Intel Chipset Drivers) RDP enabled latest Microsoft quality rollups and security patches timezone of OTC platform time synchronization with ntp server of OTC public service zone German and English keyboard Couldbase-Init agent installation and sysprep started During server startup server configuraiton is finished:
